1.text: Make sure your tortilla is large enough for its contents.

2.text: Put some moisture into your tortilla.

3.text: Carefully add the contents of the burrito to the center of the tortilla.

4.text: Join the front and bottom flap and quickly lift the tortilla into the air.

5.text: Pull the left flap of the tortilla over the burrito contents, toward the center.

6.text: Pull the right flap of the tortilla over the burrito contents, toward the center.

7.text: Tuck the top flap of the tortilla underneath the burrito contents using one or two hands.

8.text: Starting from your body and moving outward, roll the burrito forward.

10.text: Put some moisture into your tortilla.

11.text: Carefully add the contents of the burrito to the center of the tortilla, being careful not to overload.

12.text: Fold the left and right sides of the tortilla toward the center.

13.text: Grab the bottom flap of the tortilla and tuck it over and then under the contents of the burrito.

14.text: Continue rolling the tortilla until it assumes its traditional cylinder.
